plot: Laura goes for the last time to the flat she shared with her ex-girlfriend, Ingrid, to collect her things. Marcos, Ingrid's brother, knows that Laura is going to go home that day and wait her there, hidden.
title: Las chicas sólo quieren pasárselo bien
plot_es: Laura goes for the last time to the flat she shared with her ex-girlfriend, Ingrid, to collect her things. Marcos, Ingrid's brother, knows that Laura is going to go home that day and wait her there, hidden.
original_name: Las chicas sólo quieren pasárselo bien
